name: Wastelands - You Are Not Alone!
description:
Decades after the nuclear winter settled down.
You are wandering the wastelands in search of other survivors.
You are not alone, damn it! 
Well maybe not in that sense...well at least on some days.
Well, anyway, nothing beats walking around the wastelands, shooting at mutated monsters, while your eyes are burning from the burnt toast smell in the air, which we both know is just radiation, but you've grown to link that somehow to poorly made breakfast...you've stopped questioning yourself a long time ago. The important thing is that you are not alone. Or was that the problem? Who remembers...

  • Left Mouse click to move
  • Right Mouse click to shoot
  • R to reload
  • Tab to Pause/Menu
  • Shift to Run
  • T to turn Camera Zoom ON/OFF

Find survivors and bring them to the Safe Houses, which are...somewhere...
Save stuff! Feel good about yourself!
Have fun!
